meta.name: miniflux-news
meta.title: Miniflux News
meta.description: Curates Miniflux RSS feed summaries and highlights.

original_definition.skill_description: Curates Miniflux RSS feed summaries and highlights.

actions.name: Fetch RSS Feeds
actions.description: Pull the latest entries from configured Miniflux feeds.

actions.name: Summarize Feed Items
actions.description: Generate short summaries of unread feed items.

actions.name: Publish News Digest
actions.description: Output the curated digest to the requested destination.

rules.name: Verify Feed Configuration
rules.condition_expression: At least one Miniflux feed is configured

rules.name: Check Item Freshness
rules.condition_expression: Unread items are within the freshness window

directives.name: News Digest Delivered
directives.description: Miniflux news digest is curated and shared.

directives.name: Prioritize Unread Items
directives.description: Highlight unread and high-signal items before older entries.
